content.raw_text: From: NHL.tv Support <support@mail.nhl.tv> To: Lucas Müller <lucas.mueller92@gmail.com> Subject: Your NHL.tv Subscription Is Confirmed 🎉 Hi Lucas, Thank you for subscribing to NHL.tv! Your out-of-market streaming access is now active. Subscription Details Plan: Monthly Pass Start Date: June 20, 2025 Amount Charged: ₹ 1,299 (incl. applicable taxes) You’re all set! No further action is needed at this time. You can start streaming live and on-demand NHL games anytime. Need help or updates? • Visit My Account to view your subscription or download your receipt. • Manage your payment info or preferences [on NHL.tv]. • For support, go to our [Help Center]. Quick Tips & Reminders Your plan auto-renews unless canceled before the renewal date. All payments are processed securely—learn more in our [Terms & Conditions]. Thanks for joining the NHL.tv community—enjoy the season! Best regards, The NHL.tv Team support@mail.nhl.tv

From: NHL.tv Notifications <support@mail.nhl.tv> To: Las jhon <las.jhon92@gmail.com> Subject: Reminder: Your NHL.tv Renewal Is Coming Up Hi Lucas, This is a friendly reminder that your NHL.tv Monthly Pass will renew on July 20, 2025. Renewal Details Subscription: Monthly Pass Next Billing Date: July 20, 2025 Amount: ₹ 1,299 Payment Method: •••• 9923 To avoid any interruption in access, please ensure your payment information is up to date. What You Can Do • Update your payment method via My Account • Need a different plan? Visit the Subscription Plans page • For assistance, head to our Help Center Just so you know… You have until 5 days after renewal to request a refund under our policy. If you’d like to cancel, please do so before the billing date to prevent the next payment. Thanks for your continued support—enjoy another great season with NHL.tv! Warm regards, The NHL.tv Team 📩 support@mail.nhl.tv

From: NHL.tv Billing <support@mail.nhl.tv> To: Lucas Müller <lucas.mueller92@gmail.com> Subject: Payment Failed – Update Required to Keep Your NHL.tv Access Hi Lucas, We were unable to process your NHL.tv Monthly Pass payment today. Payment Issue Due Date: June 20, 2025 Amount: ₹ 1,299 Payment Method: •••• 9923 Please update your billing information within the next 7 days to avoid service interruption. How to Update Your Payment Info Log in and visit My Account → Billing Add a new payment method or select an existing one Re-submit the payment Once updated, your subscription will resume automatically without loss of access. Need Help? • Visit our Help Center or live chat • Contact support directly via the Support Portal Note: If payment isn’t completed within 7 days, your subscription may be suspended. To maintain uninterrupted access, please update promptly. Thank you for choosing NHL.tv—we’re here if you need assistance. Sincerely, The NHL.tv Billing Team 📩 support@mail.nhl.tv

From: NHL.tv Support <support@mail.nhl.tv> To: Lucas Müller <lucas.mueller92@gmail.com> Subject: Your NHL.tv Refund Has Been Processed Hi Lucas, We’ve successfully processed your refund for your NHL.tv Monthly Pass subscription. Refund Summary Plan: NHL.tv Monthly Pass Refund Amount: ₹ 1,299 Refund Date: June 20, 2025 Payment Method: •••• 9923 The amount will be credited back to your original payment method. Depending on your bank, it may take 5–10 business days to appear in your account. Need to Reactivate? Your subscription has been canceled. You can restart it anytime by visiting the My Account section on NHL.tv. Questions or Concerns? • Visit our [Help Center] for FAQs • Contact us directly at support@mail.nhl.tv Thank you for trying NHL.tv. We hope to see you back soon. Best regards, The NHL.tv Support Team 📩 support@mail.nhl.tv

From: NHL.tv Support <support@mail.nhl.tv> To: Jackson Reed <jackson.reed78@gmail.com> Subject: Your NHL.tv Account Has Been Deleted Hi Jackson, This is to confirm that your NHL.tv account associated with this email address has been successfully deleted as per your request. Account Details User Name: Jackson Reed Email ID: jackson.reed78@gmail.com Deletion Date: June 20, 2025 Your account data, subscription history, and any saved preferences have been removed from our system in accordance with our privacy policy. What Happens Next? If you had an active subscription, it has been canceled. You will no longer receive any promotional or service-related emails. Refunds (if applicable) have been processed separately If you did not request this change or believe this was a mistake, please contact our support team within 7 days. Need Help? • Visit our [Help Center] • Reach us directly at: support@mail.nhl.tv Thank you for being part of NHL.tv. We hope to welcome you back in the future. Warm regards, The NHL.tv Support Team 📩 support@mail.nhl.tv
